程序包 hangman.game

类 HangmanUI

java.lang.Object
hangman.game.HangmanUI
public class HangmanUI extends Object
Represents the User Interface for the Hangman game, managing interactions between the user and the game logic. This class is responsible for displaying game state to the user, handling user input, and updating the game state accordingly.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    HangmanUI(HangmanGameLogic gameLogic, UserInput userInput)
    Constructs a HangmanUI instance with the specified game logic and user input mechanism.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型

    play()
    Orchestrates the game play, looping through game states until the game is won or lost.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • HangmanUI

      public HangmanUI(HangmanGameLogic gameLogic, UserInput userInput)
      Constructs a HangmanUI instance with the specified game logic and user input mechanism.
      参数:
      gameLogic - The game logic to be used by this UI.
      userInput - The input mechanism to be used for reading user input.

  • 方法详细资料

    • play

      public void play()
      Orchestrates the game play, looping through game states until the game is won or lost. During each loop, it displays the game state, prompts the user for a guess, and processes that guess.
